    • Uses of StepSolver in com.sri.ai.grinder.sgdpllt.api

      Subinterfaces of StepSolver in com.sri.ai.grinder.sgdpllt.api 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver
      An indicator interface for ExpressionStepSolvers that only split on the context using literals (i.e.
      interface  ExpressionStepSolver
      A StepSolver specialized for problems with Expression-typed solutions.
      interface  LiteralSplitterStepSolver<T>
      A specialization of the StepSolver interface that indicates splitting only ever occurs using literals and not general formulas.
      Methods in com.sri.ai.grinder.sgdpllt.api that return StepSolver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StepSolver<T> StepSolver.clone()
      Cloning is important for this interface, because when a problem depends on an expression to be solved the StepSolver.ItDependsOn solver step will carry within it two sub-step solvers to be used on the two branches of the search (one for when the expression is enforced to be true, and another for false).
      StepSolver<T> StepSolver.Step.getStepSolverForWhenSplitterIsFalse()
      Same as StepSolver.Step.getStepSolverForWhenSplitterIsTrue() but for when splitter is false.
      StepSolver<T> StepSolver.ItDependsOn.getStepSolverForWhenSplitterIsFalse() 
      StepSolver<T> StepSolver.Solution.getStepSolverForWhenSplitterIsFalse() 
      StepSolver<T> StepSolver.Step.getStepSolverForWhenSplitterIsTrue()
      Returns a StepSolver to be used for finding the final solution in case the splitter is defined as true by the context.
      StepSolver<T> StepSolver.ItDependsOn.getStepSolverForWhenSplitterIsTrue() 
      StepSolver<T> StepSolver.Solution.getStepSolverForWhenSplitterIsTrue() 
      Constructors in com.sri.ai.grinder.sgdpllt.api with parameters of type StepSolver 
      Constructor and Description
      ItDependsOn(Expression splitter, ContextSplitting contextSplitting, StepSolver<T> stepSolverIfSplitterIsTrue, StepSolver<T> stepSolverIfSplitterIsFalse)
      Represents a solver step in which the final solution depends on the definition of a given expression by the context.
      ItDependsOn(Expression splitter, ContextSplitting contextSplitting, StepSolver<T> stepSolverIfSplitterIsTrue, StepSolver<T> stepSolverIfSplitterIsFalse)
      Represents a solver step in which the final solution depends on the definition of a given expression by the context.

    • Uses of StepSolver in com.sri.ai.grinder.sgdpllt.core.solver

      Subinterfaces of StepSolver in com.sri.ai.grinder.sgdpllt.core.solver 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  QuantifierEliminationStepSolver
      An interface for step solvers for quantified expressions (the quantification being based on an associative commutative group's operation).
      Classes in com.sri.ai.grinder.sgdpllt.core.solver that implement StepSolver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractBooleanWithPropagatedLiteralsRequiringPropagatedLiteralsAndCNFToBeSatisfiedStepSolver
      A specialization of AbstractExpressionWithPropagatedLiteralsStepSolver that returns solution false if propagated literals and propagated CNF are not satisfied by the context.
      class  AbstractExpressionWithPropagatedLiteralsStepSolver
      An abstract implementation for step solvers for problems based on a propagated literals, and a propagated CNF.
      class  AbstractModelCountingWithPropagatedLiteralsImportedFromSatisfiabilityStepSolver
      An abstract step solver for model counting step solvers.
      class  AbstractQuantifierEliminationStepSolver
      An abstract implementation for step solvers for quantified expressions (the quantification being based on an associative commutative group's operation).
      class  ExpressionStepSolverToLiteralSplitterStepSolverAdapter
      An adapter that allows ExpressionStepSolvers to be used in situations where ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolvers are required (i.e.
      class  QuantifierEliminationOnBodyInWhichIndexOnlyOccursInsideLiteralsStepSolver
      A AbstractQuantifierEliminationStepSolver for quantifiers based on a group, and with body in which the index occurs in literals only.

    • Uses of StepSolver in com.sri.ai.grinder.sgdpllt.helper

      Classes in com.sri.ai.grinder.sgdpllt.helper that implement StepSolver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BruteForceFallbackQuantifierEliminationStepSolverWrapper
      Wraps a base QuantifierEliminationStepSolver into another one that solves the problem by brute force when the base one cannot.
      class  FunctionBasedStepSolver
      A context-dependent expression problem step solver based on applying a given function to the result of another context-dependent expression problem step solver.
      class  MaximumExpressionStepSolver
      A context-dependent problem step solver deciding which in a set of expressions is the maximum one given an order.
      class  SelectExpressionsSatisfyingComparisonStepSolver
      A context-dependent problem step solver deciding which in a set of expressions that satisfy a comparison according to a given functor and bound.

    • Uses of StepSolver in com.sri.ai.grinder.sgdpllt.theory.base

      Classes in com.sri.ai.grinder.sgdpllt.theory.base that implement StepSolver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractDecisionOnAllOrderedPairsOfExpressionsStepSolver
      A context-dependent problem step solver making decisions for literals based on all pairs of expressions in a given list
      class  AbstractExpressionsSequenceStepSolver<T>
      An extension of AbstractLinearStepSolver that obtains the literals to be tested from a given list of expressions.
      class  AbstractLinearStepSolver<T>
      An abstract context-dependent problem step solver going over a sequence of integers up to a value n.
      class  AbstractSelectionStepSolver
      A context-dependent problem step solver taking a list of expressions e1,...,e_n and computing the sub-list e_{j_1},...,e_{j_m} such that all e_i is in the sub-list if and only if the result of invoking AbstractExpressionsSequenceStepSolver.makeLiteralBasedOn(Expression) on e_i is true in the context.
      class  ConstantExpressionStepSolver
      A step solver always returning a constant expression solution regardless of the context.
      class  ConstantStepSolver<T>
      A step solver always returning a constant solution regardless of the context.
      class  ExpressionWrapperStepSolver<T>
      A context-dependent problem step solver adapting a non-Expression step solver to one in which solutions are wrapped into one by a user-specified function.
      class  FunctionOnContextExpressionStepSolver
      A step solver always returning the result of a function (on the context) as a Solution.
      class  LiteralExpressionStepSolver
      A context-dependent problem step solver that simply decides whether a literal is true or not, producing boolean Expression.
      class  LiteralStepSolver
      A context-dependent problem step solver that simply decides whether a literal is true or not.
      class  UnificationStepSolver

      class  ModelCountingOfSingleVariableDifferenceArithmeticConstraintStepSolver
      A AbstractSingleVariableDifferenceArithmeticConstraintFeasibilityRegionStepSolver computing the number of values for the variable satisfying the constraints.

      A step solver for a summation with an integer index constrained by difference arithmetic literals, over a polynomial on integers.
      class  ValuesOfSingleVariableDifferenceArithmeticConstraintStepSolver
      A step solver computing the possible values of the variable of a single-variable difference arithmetic constraint.

      class  IntervalWithMeasureEquivalentToSingleVariableLinearRealArithmeticConstraintStepSolver
      A step solver computing an interval of values for the variable of a single-variable linear arithmetic constraint that has the same measure as its set of solutions, which is an interval minus the distinct disequals (which have measure zero).
      class  MeasureOfSingleVariableLinearRealArithmeticConstraintStepSolver
      A AbstractSingleVariableLinearRealArithmeticConstraintFeasibilityRegionStepSolver computing the measure of the set of values for variable satisfying the constraints.

    • Uses of StepSolver in com.sri.ai.grinder.sgdpllt.theory.numeric

      Classes in com.sri.ai.grinder.sgdpllt.theory.numeric that implement StepSolver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractSingleVariableNumericConstraintFeasibilityRegionStepSolver
      A AbstractExpressionWithPropagatedLiteralsStepSolver for a AbstractSingleVariableNumericConstraint with basic methods for determining the feasibility region of the variable, but leaving the determination of the final solution to AbstractSingleVariableNumericConstraintFeasibilityRegionStepSolver.solutionIfPropagatedLiteralsAndSplittersCNFAreSatisfied(Context).
